text: This article documents the impacts of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic in Botswana. On 30 March 2020, the first three cases in the country were confirmed. On 25 March a 78-year-old woman who was suspected of having COVID-19 died in Ramotswa. A few days after her death, the results came back positive making it the fourth case of COVID-19 in Botswana. ==References== Category:Botswana Botswana
title: COVID-19 pandemic in Botswana
